00080 // matrix elements as in Radii.c
00081 
00082 static void ob_r2(const SlaterDet* Q,
00083                   const Gaussian*G1, const Gaussian* G2, 
00084                   const GaussianAux* X, complex double* r2)
00085 {
00086   int A=Q->A;
00087 
00088   *r2 += 1.0/A*(1.0-1.0/A)* (3*X->alpha + X->rho2)* X->Q;
00089 }
00090 
00091 static void ob_er2(const SlaterDet* Q,
00092                    const Gaussian*G1, const Gaussian* G2, 
00093                    const GaussianAux* X, complex double* r2)
00094 {
00095   int A=Q->A;
00096   int Z=Q->Z;
00097 
00098   // radius with respec to mass cm
00099   // *r2 += (1.0/(A*A) + (1+G1->xi)/2 *(1.0/Z-2.0/(A*Z)))*         
00100   //   (3*X->alpha + X->rho2)* X->Q;
00101 
00102   // radius with respect to proton cm
00103   *r2 += 1.0/Z*(1.0-1.0/Z)* (1+G1->xi)/2* (3*X->alpha + X->rho2)* X->Q;
00104 }
00105 
00106 static void ob_nr2(const SlaterDet* Q,
00107                    const Gaussian*G1, const Gaussian* G2, 
00108                    const GaussianAux* X, complex double* r2)
00109 {
00110   int A=Q->A;
00111   int N=Q->N;
00112 
00113   // radius with respec to mass cm
00114   // *r2 += (1.0/(A*A) + (1-G1->xi)/2 *(1.0/N-2.0/(A*N)))* 
00115   //   (3*X->alpha + X->rho2)* X->Q;
00116 
00117   // radius with respect to neutron cm
00118   *r2 += 1.0/N*(1.0-1.0/N)* (1-G1->xi)/2* (3*X->alpha + X->rho2)* X->Q;
00119 }
00120 
00121 
00122 static void tb_r2(const SlaterDet* Q,
00123                   const Gaussian* G1, const Gaussian* G2, 
00124                   const Gaussian* G3, const Gaussian* G4, 
00125                   const GaussianAux* X13, const GaussianAux* X24, 
00126                   complex double* r2)
00127 {       
00128   int A=Q->A;
00129 
00130   *r2 += -2.0/(A*A)* cvec3mult(X13->rho, X24->rho)*X13->Q*X24->Q;
00131 }
00132 
00133 static void tb_er2(const SlaterDet* Q,
00134                    const Gaussian* G1, const Gaussian* G2, 
00135                    const Gaussian* G3, const Gaussian* G4, 
00136                    const GaussianAux* X13, const GaussianAux* X24, 
00137                    complex double* r2)
00138 {       
00139   int A=Q->A;
00140   int Z=Q->Z;
00141 
00142   // radius with respect to mass cm
00143   // *r2 += 2.0*(1.0/(A*A) - ((1+G1->xi)/2+(1+G2->xi)/2) *1.0/(A*Z))*
00144   //   cvec3mult(X13->rho, X24->rho)*X13->Q*X24->Q;
00145 
00146   // radius with respect to proton cm
00147   *r2 += -2.0/(Z*Z)* (1+G1->xi)/2* (1+G2->xi)/2*
00148     cvec3mult(X13->rho, X24->rho)*X13->Q*X24->Q;
00149 }
00150 
00151 static void tb_nr2(const SlaterDet* Q,
00152                    const Gaussian* G1, const Gaussian* G2, 
00153                    const Gaussian* G3, const Gaussian* G4, 
00154                    const GaussianAux* X13, const GaussianAux* X24, 
00155                    complex double* r2)
00156 {       
00157   int A=Q->A;
00158   int N=Q->N;
00159 
00160   // radius with respect to mass cm
00161   // *r2 += 2.0*(1.0/(A*A) - ((1-G1->xi)/2+(1-G2->xi)/2) *1.0/(A*N))*
00162   //   cvec3mult(X13->rho, X24->rho)*X13->Q*X24->Q;
00163 
00164   // radius with respect to neutron cm
00165   *r2 += -2.0/(N*N)* (1-G1->xi)/2* (1-G2->xi)/2*
00166     cvec3mult(X13->rho, X24->rho)*X13->Q*X24->Q;
00167 }
00168 
00169 
00170 static void gob_r2(const SlaterDet* Q,
00171                    const Gaussian* G1, const Gaussian* G2,
00172                    const GaussianAux* X, const gradGaussianAux* dX,
00173                    complex double* r2, gradGaussian* dr2)
00174 {
00175   int A=Q->A;
00176   complex double mr2;
00177   double factor;
00178   int i;
00179 
00180   mr2 = 3*X->alpha + X->rho2;
00181   factor = 1.0/A*(1.0-1.0/A);
00182 
00183   *r2 += factor* mr2* X->Q;
00184 
00185   for (i=0; i<2; i++)
00186     dr2->chi[i] += factor* mr2* dX->dQ.chi[i];
00187   dr2->a += factor*
00188     ((3*dX->dalpha + dX->drho2.a)* X->Q + mr2* dX->dQ.a);
00189   for (i=0; i<3; i++) 
00190     dr2->b[i] += factor*
00191       (dX->drho2.b[i]* X->Q + mr2* dX->dQ.b[i]);
00192 }
00193 
00194 static void gob_er2(const SlaterDet* Q,
00195                     const Gaussian* G1, const Gaussian* G2,
00196                     const GaussianAux* X, const gradGaussianAux* dX,
00197                     complex double* r2, gradGaussian* dr2)
00198 {
00199   int A=Q->A;
00200   int Z=Q->Z;
00201   complex double mr2;
00202   double factor;
00203   int i;
00204 
00205   mr2 = 3*X->alpha + X->rho2;
00206   // factor = (1.0/(A*A) + (1+G1->xi)/2 *(1.0/Z-2.0/(A*Z)));
00207   factor = 1.0/Z*(1.0-1.0/Z)* (1+G1->xi)/2;
00208 
00209   *r2 += factor* mr2* X->Q;
00210 
00211   for (i=0; i<2; i++)
00212     dr2->chi[i] += factor* mr2* dX->dQ.chi[i];
00213   dr2->a += factor*
00214     ((3*dX->dalpha + dX->drho2.a)* X->Q + mr2* dX->dQ.a);
00215   for (i=0; i<3; i++) 
00216     dr2->b[i] += factor*
00217       (dX->drho2.b[i]* X->Q + mr2* dX->dQ.b[i]);
00218 }
00219 
00220 static void gob_nr2(const SlaterDet* Q,
00221                     const Gaussian* G1, const Gaussian* G2,
00222                     const GaussianAux* X, const gradGaussianAux* dX,
00223                     complex double* r2, gradGaussian* dr2)
00224 {
00225   int A=Q->A;
00226   int N=Q->N;
00227   complex double mr2;
00228   double factor;
00229   int i;
00230 
00231   mr2 = 3*X->alpha + X->rho2;
00232   // factor = (1.0/(A*A) + (1-G1->xi)/2 *(1.0/N-2.0/(A*N)));
00233   factor = 1.0/N*(1.0-1.0/N)* (1-G1->xi)/2;
00234 
00235   *r2 += factor* mr2* X->Q;
00236 
00237   for (i=0; i<2; i++)
00238     dr2->chi[i] += factor* mr2* dX->dQ.chi[i];
00239   dr2->a += factor*
00240     ((3*dX->dalpha + dX->drho2.a)* X->Q + mr2* dX->dQ.a);
00241   for (i=0; i<3; i++) 
00242     dr2->b[i] += factor*
00243       (dX->drho2.b[i]* X->Q + mr2* dX->dQ.b[i]);
00244 }

00246 
00247 static void gtb_r2(const SlaterDet* Q,
00248                    const Gaussian* G1, const Gaussian* G2, 
00249                    const Gaussian* G3, const Gaussian* G4, 
00250                    const GaussianAux* X13, const GaussianAux* X24,
00251                    const gradGaussianAux* dX13,
00252                    complex double* r2, gradGaussian* dr2)
00253 {
00254   int A=Q->A;
00255   int i;
00256   complex double mr2;
00257   double factor;
00258 
00259   mr2 = cvec3mult(X13->rho, X24->rho);
00260   factor = -2.0/(A*A);
00261 
00262   *r2 += factor* mr2* X13->Q*X24->Q;
00263 
00264   for (i=0; i<2; i++)
00265     dr2->chi[i] += factor* mr2* dX13->dQ.chi[i]* X24->Q; 
00266 
00267   dr2->a += factor*
00268     (cvec3mult(dX13->drho.a, X24->rho)* X13->Q*X24->Q +
00269      mr2* dX13->dQ.a* X24->Q);
00270   for (i=0; i<3; i++)
00271     dr2->b[i] += factor*
00272       (dX13->drho.b* X24->rho[i]* X13->Q* X24->Q +
00273        mr2* dX13->dQ.b[i]* X24->Q);
00274 }
00275 
00276 static void gtb_er2(const SlaterDet* Q,
00277                     const Gaussian* G1, const Gaussian* G2, 
00278                     const Gaussian* G3, const Gaussian* G4, 
00279                     const GaussianAux* X13, const GaussianAux* X24,
00280                     const gradGaussianAux* dX13,
00281                     complex double* r2, gradGaussian* dr2)
00282 {
00283   int A=Q->A;
00284   int Z=Q->Z;
00285   int i;
00286   complex double mr2;
00287   double factor;
00288 
00289   mr2 = cvec3mult(X13->rho, X24->rho);
00290   // factor = 2.0*(1.0/(A*A) - ((1+G1->xi)/2+(1+G2->xi)/2) *1.0/(A*Z));
00291   factor = -2.0/(Z*Z)* (1+G1->xi)/2* (1+G2->xi)/2;
00292 
00293   *r2 += factor* mr2* X13->Q*X24->Q;
00294 
00295   for (i=0; i<2; i++)
00296     dr2->chi[i] += factor* mr2* dX13->dQ.chi[i]* X24->Q; 
00297 
00298   dr2->a += factor*
00299     (cvec3mult(dX13->drho.a, X24->rho)* X13->Q*X24->Q +
00300      mr2* dX13->dQ.a* X24->Q);
00301   for (i=0; i<3; i++)
00302     dr2->b[i] += factor*
00303       (dX13->drho.b* X24->rho[i]* X13->Q* X24->Q +
00304        mr2* dX13->dQ.b[i]* X24->Q);
00305 }
00306 
00307 static void gtb_nr2(const SlaterDet* Q,
00308                     const Gaussian* G1, const Gaussian* G2, 
00309                     const Gaussian* G3, const Gaussian* G4, 
00310                     const GaussianAux* X13, const GaussianAux* X24,
00311                     const gradGaussianAux* dX13,
00312                     complex double* r2, gradGaussian* dr2)
00313 {
00314   int A=Q->A;
00315   int N=Q->N;
00316   int i;
00317   complex double mr2;
00318   double factor;
00319 
00320   mr2 = cvec3mult(X13->rho, X24->rho);
00321   // factor = 2.0*(1.0/(A*A) - ((1-G1->xi)/2+(1-G2->xi)/2) *1.0/(A*N));
00322   factor = -2.0/(N*N)* (1+G1->xi)/2* (1+G2->xi)/2;
00323 
00324   *r2 += factor* mr2* X13->Q*X24->Q;
00325 
00326   for (i=0; i<2; i++)
00327     dr2->chi[i] += factor* mr2* dX13->dQ.chi[i]* X24->Q; 
00328 
00329   dr2->a += factor*
00330     (cvec3mult(dX13->drho.a, X24->rho)* X13->Q*X24->Q +
00331      mr2* dX13->dQ.a* X24->Q);
00332   for (i=0; i<3; i++)
00333     dr2->b[i] += factor*
00334       (dX13->drho.b* X24->rho[i]* X13->Q* X24->Q +
00335        mr2* dX13->dQ.b[i]* X24->Q);
00336 }

00338 
00339 void calcConstraintR2(const SlaterDet* Q, const SlaterDetAux* X, 
00340                       double* r2)
00341 {
00342   double r2one, r2two;
00343   OneBodyOperator op_ob_r2 = {dim: 1, opt: 1, par: Q, me: ob_r2};
00344   TwoBodyOperator op_tb_r2 = {dim: 1, opt: 1, par: Q, me: tb_r2};
00345 
00346 
00347   calcSlaterDetOBME(Q, X, &op_ob_r2, &r2one);
00348   calcSlaterDetTBME(Q, X, &op_tb_r2, &r2two);
00349 
00350   *r2 = r2one + r2two;
00351 }
00352 
00353 
00354 void calcgradConstraintR2(const SlaterDet* Q, const SlaterDetAux* X,
00355                           const gradSlaterDetAux* dX,
00356                           gradSlaterDet* dr2)
00357 {
00358   gradOneBodyOperator gop_ob_r2 = {opt: 1, par: Q, me: gob_r2};
00359   gradTwoBodyOperator gop_tb_r2 = {opt: 1, par: Q, me: gtb_r2};
00360 
00361 
00362   calcgradSlaterDetOBME(Q, X, dX, &gop_ob_r2, dr2);
00363   calcgradSlaterDetTBME(Q, X, dX, &gop_tb_r2, dr2);
00364 }

00367 void calcConstraintR2od(const SlaterDet* Q, const SlaterDet* Qp,
00368                         const SlaterDetAux* X, 
00369                         complex double* r2)
00370 {
00371   complex double r2one, r2two;
00372   OneBodyOperator op_ob_r2 = {dim: 1, opt: 1, par: Q, me: ob_r2};
00373   TwoBodyOperator op_tb_r2 = {dim: 1, opt: 1, par: Q, me: tb_r2};
00374 
00375 
00376   calcSlaterDetOBMEod(Q, Qp, X, &op_ob_r2, &r2one);
00377   calcSlaterDetTBMEod(Q, Qp, X, &op_tb_r2, &r2two);
00378 
00379   *r2 = r2one + r2two;
00380 }

00383 void calcgradConstraintR2od(const SlaterDet* Q, const SlaterDet* Qp,
00384                             const SlaterDetAux* X,
00385                             const gradSlaterDetAux* dX,
00386                             const double* dummy,
00387                             gradSlaterDet* dr2)
00388 {
00389   gradOneBodyOperator gop_ob_r2 = {opt: 1, par: Q, me: gob_r2};
00390   gradTwoBodyOperator gop_tb_r2 = {opt: 1, par: Q, me: gtb_r2};
00391 
00392 
00393   calcgradSlaterDetOBMEod(Q, Qp, X, dX, &gop_ob_r2, dr2);
00394   calcgradSlaterDetTBMEod(Q, Qp, X, dX, &gop_tb_r2, dr2);
00395 }

00397 
00398 double outputConstraintR2(double val)
00399 {
00400   return(sqrt(val));
00401 }

00462 
00463 double outputConstraintER2(double val)
00464 {
00465   if (val > 0.0)
00466     return(sqrt(val));
00467   else
00468     return(-sqrt(-val));
00469 }
